thread.title: Mel B’s Pissed At Victoria Beckham For Spice Girls-Themed ‘Carpool Karaoke’
thread.title_full: Mel B’s Pissed At Victoria Beckham For Spice Girls-Themed ‘Carpool Karaoke’

author: Amanda Fama
title: Mel B’s Pissed At Victoria Beckham For Spice Girls-Themed ‘Carpool Karaoke’
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
Victoria Beckham — formerly Posh Spice of the Spice Girls — is going to appear on James Corden’s “Carpool Karaoke” on Friday night. 
While some fans are stoked to reminisce about the good ol’ Spice Girls glory days, others are a little skeptical she’s the only member of the pop band being featured… especially after she completely distanced herself from their previous reunion band and tour. 
Scary Spice certainly isn’t having it, and she is “livid” about Beckham’s decision to be on Corden’s show. Corden and Beckham spice things up in Mannequin parody To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Sources told The Sun how furious Mel B became upon discovering her former bandmate was going to sing their hit songs on Carpool Karaoke. 
Apparently, Mel B feels Beckham is using their old Spice Girls material to promote her own fashion career. 
The source said, 
Mel is livid Victoria is all of a sudden embracing her Spice Girls past after years of trying to distance herself from the band. She was desperate for the girls to go on a very lucrative reunion tour to celebrate their music with millions of fans. 
But once Posh pulled out, the idea began to crumble leaving the members of the band who were keen to perform having no choice but to ditch it.
